Message:
It’s been a while since
I basked in the sun’s rays,
but I still haven’t finished
the picture.

So, on a whim, I decided to
paint one of you—yes you—
the lord around here as
the subject.

Hm? Oh, no, it’s fine.
Thanks to you,
I’ve no shortage of
painting materials now.

Plus, no matter what materials
I use to paint you with,
your color’ll always
stand out anyway.

...Jeez, you sure are
a hard one to paint, though.

But, that’s all the more reason
why I wanted to paint you—
someone who’s still alive
for a change.

What? Do you doubt
the skills of the great Cherna—
genius painter extraordinaire?
